name: Aflame
effect: Every end of riff, suffer 1 True Hit, and you’re vulnerable to attacks that douse or set aflame. Canceled out by being doused.

name: Bleeding
effect: 1/Riff, suffer 1 True Hit when you move or are moved in any way (into or out of a tile). Cleansed if you don’t move at all on your own Riff.

name: Chilled
effect: Every tile is Difficult Terrain for you and your Jump becomes 1. You become vulnerable to attacks that set aflame. Canceled out by attacks that set aflame.

name: Confused
effect: Your mental faculties have been assailed! Whenever you spend a Beat, you have a 25% chance of suffering 1 Attack Die instead and you waste that Beat. Cleansed after you suffer an attack.

name: Dazzled
effect: You can only target adjacent squares or fighters on the same elevation. Area attack origin points can only be drawn from adjacent tiles. You’re vulnerable to attacks that confuse and suffer -1 Posture. Cleansed at the end of your next riff.

name: Debilitated
effect: Your Bravery and Faith suffer -1, to a minimum of 1. Cleansed at the end of your next riff.

name: Doused
effect: While doused, you’re vulnerable to attacks that shock and chill and resistant to attacks that set aflame. You also conduct electricity. If you’re doused again or chilled, replace the douse with chilled. Canceled out by attacks that set aflame or shock.

name: Haste
effect: You double your Speed. Cancels out Slow. Cleansed at the end of your next riff.

name: Juggled
effect: You’re up in the air: Suffer -1d to all Defense rolls, you can’t Evade and attacks against you ignore Combo Breaker. Juggled is automatically cleansed at the start of your riff or if you’re dropped to the ground.

name: Poisoned
effect: Every end of riff, suffer 1 True Hit. You’re vulnerable to attacks that Poison. Cleansed by being healed beyond your max HP.

name: Slowed
effect: Your Speed is halved, rounded up. Cancels out Haste. Cleansed at the end of your next riff

name: Stealth
effect: You are only a valid target for fighters that are adjacent to you on the same elevation. Only cleansed after you are attacked or after you make an attack.

name: Shocked
effect: You cannot make attacks and suffer +2d from all attacks against you. Cleanse after suffering an attack. While Shocked, fighters cannot be shocked again.

name: Stunned
effect: You suffer -1 Beat. Cleansed at the end of your next riff.

name: Wide Open
effect: You suffer -1 to your Posture and Resilience, you cannot Evade, and you cannot Guard. Cleansed at the end of your next riff.
